title: Zareen Khan, Sharman Joshi get intimate in first 'Hate Story 3' song
text:
Zareen Khan and Sharman Joshi go bold and dare to bare in the first song titled 'Tumhe Apna Banane Ka' from the erotic thriller 'Hate Story 3'.
Watch video: 

The song was originally used in 'Sadak' (1991) and has been recreated by music composer Amaal Mallik and crooned by Armaan Malik and Neeti Mohan.
Also see:  Sizzling hot! Watch the motion poster of 'Hate Story 3' 
Also featuring Karan Singh Grover and Daisy Shah, the film promises to be bolder than the previous two installments.
The trailer, which was released on October 16, has already crossed 10 million views.
Watch the trailer of 'Hate Story 3' 

Produced by Bhushan Kumar's T-series, 'Hate Story 3' has been directed by Vishal Pandya, who had also helmed 'Hate Story 2'.
Also see:  Zareen Khan and Daisy Shah heat it up 
'Hate Story' released in 2012 and starred Nikhil Dwivedi, Gulshan Devaiah and Paoli Dam in lead roles. The second part starring Sushant Singh, Surveen Chawla and Jay Bhanushali hit theatres last year.
